sn7.9:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati sundarikāya nadiyā tīre.
sn7.9:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo sundarikāya nadiyā tīre aggiṃ juhati, aggihuttaṃ paricarati.
sn7.9:4.3: Atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo aggiṃ juhitvā aggihuttaṃ paricaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā samantā catuddisā anuvilokesi:
sn7.9:4.5: Addasā kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle sasīsaṃ pārutaṃ nisinnaṃ.
sn7.9:4.6: Disvāna vāmena hatthena habyasesaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kamaṇḍaluṃ gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn7.9:4.7: Atha kho bhagavā sundarikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa padasaddena sīsaṃ vivari.
sn7.9:4.8: Atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo “muṇḍo ayaṃ bhavaṃ, muṇḍako ayaṃ bhavan”ti tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn7.9:5.1: Atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.9:6.1: * “Mā jātiṃ puccha caraṇañca puccha,
sn7.9:10.1: * “Gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyyaṃ,
sn7.9:12.1: “Atha kassa cāhaṃ, bho gotama, imaṃ habyasesaṃ dammī”ti?
sn7.9:12.2: “Na khvāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yasseso habyaseso bhutto sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya aññatra, brāhmaṇa, tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā.
sn7.9:12.3: Tena hi tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, taṃ habyasesaṃ appaharite vā chaḍḍehi appāṇake vā udake opilāpehī”ti.
sn7.9:13.1: Atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo taṃ habyasesaṃ appāṇake udake opilāpesi.
sn7.9:13.2: Atha kho so habyaseso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
sn7.9:13.3: Seyyathāpi nāma phālo divasaṃsantatto udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati;
sn7.9:13.4: evameva so habyaseso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
sn7.9:14.1: Atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.9:14.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sundarikabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
sn7.9:15.3: Na hi tena suddhiṃ kusalā vadanti,
sn7.9:16.2: Ajjhattamevujjalayāmi jotiṃ;
sn7.9:17.1: * Māno hi te brāhmaṇa khāribhāro,
sn7.9:18.4: Anallagattāva taranti pāraṃ.
sn7.9:20.1: Evaṃ vutte, sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.9:20.3: aññataro ca panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṃ ahosīti.
